column1: Kata Robata////We started out with some drinks
column2: and they were excellent. I was happy to note that they were in the high-falutin mixologist style pioneered by Anvil (and demonstrated at a number of other Houston restaurants). I had some Manhattan-y type of drink. Both were more than acceptable
column3: though like any other drinks of this type
column4: expensive. I think they ran about $10 apiece.
